name: hmeocn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1))))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))

comment: A homeomorphism is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
